data.name: Bellsprout_Line_001
data.value: Shroomish and I got to this camp no problem,[pause=0] but the dungeon ahead is another story.

data.name: Bellsprout_Line_002
data.value: The Flying-type Pokémon there just ruin us.

data.name: Bellsprout_Line_003
data.value: Shouldn't we ask an Electric Pokémon for help?

data.name: Broke_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I heard you're good at adventuring and discovered a lot of dungeons.[br]Could you help me find the lost satchel I dropped at flyaway cliffs?

data.name: Broke_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Could you help me find the lost satchel I dropped at flyaway cliffs?

data.name: Broke_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for finding the lost satchel I dropped at flyaway cliffs.[br]Have this as a reward.

data.name: Broke_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]The silk I gave you, use it well![br]You can't lose it if you faint in a dungeon!

data.name: Carry_Line_001
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Deliver NPC had his package stolen in Faded Trail! Please help!

data.name: Carry_Line_002
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Deliver NPC had his package stolen in Faded Trail! (You already have the quest)

data.name: Carry_Line_003
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Did you get back the supplies?

data.name: Carry_Line_004
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Thanks for helping our delivery. Now we can go to canyon camp.

data.name: Carry_Line_005
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Our boss went ahead in ravine camp. We'll head there tomorrow too!

data.name: Carry_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp](carry) I'm on my routine route in forest camp!

data.name: Catch_Done_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]That gem! You got it back!

data.name: Catch_Done_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Oh thank you thank you thank you!

data.name: Catch_Done_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]We're saved! I thought we were gonna have to trade for a new one.[br]Here you can have this!

data.name: Catch_Done_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]Let's go home.

data.name: Catch_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]We're playing catch by the cliffs!

data.name: Catch_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Oh no! I fumbled the ball!

data.name: Catch_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]No! That was my dad's one and only Normal Gem signed by Babe Ruth![br]And now it's fallen into Overgrown Wilds!

data.name: Catch_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]What?? NOOOOOOO!

data.name: Catch_Line_005
data.value: [tmp]What're we gonna do?

data.name: Catch_Line_006
data.value: [tmp]Overgrown Wilds is covered in underbrush... we'll never find that gem...

data.name: Conjurer_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Watch the fire spin around us!

data.name: Conjurer_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]We're different than how we were when we set foot on this island.

data.name: Deliver_Line_001
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Deliver NPC had his package stolen in Faded Trail! Please help!

data.name: Deliver_Line_002
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Deliver NPC had his package stolen in Faded Trail! (You already have the quest)

data.name: Deliver_Line_003
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Did you get back the supplies?

data.name: Deliver_Line_004
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Thanks for helping our delivery. Now we can go to canyon camp.

data.name: Deliver_Line_005
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Our boss went ahead in ravine camp. We'll head there tomorrow too!

data.name: Deliver_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp](deliver) I'm on my routine route in forest camp!

data.name: DexRater_Check_000
data.value: It looks like you haven't befriended any Pokémon yet...[br]Did you know you can recruit them by throwing Apricorns at them?

data.name: DexRater_Check_001
data.value: {0}, was it?[pause=0] I heard your team's befriended {1} kinds of Pokémon!

data.name: DexRater_Full_001
data.value: Thanks for bringing the Pokémon of this island closer together!

data.name: DexRater_Intro_001
data.value: The assembly bell's a wonderful thing \u266A[pause=0]\nBring all your friends over with just one ring \u266A

data.name: DexRater_Next_001
data.value: If you can befriend {0} kinds of Pokémon,[pause=30] I'll give you something special \u266A

data.name: DexRater_Reward_Dungeon
data.value: A good deed,[pause=30] indeed![pause=0]\n As thanks,[pause=30] let me tell you a secret...

data.name: DexRater_Reward_Dungeon_Alt
data.value: Also,[pause=30] let me tell you a secret...

data.name: DexRater_Reward_Item
data.value: Thanks for bringing everyone a little closer together![scroll] Please,[pause=30] take this token of appreciation.

data.name: DexRater_Reward_Item_Alt
data.value: Also,[pause=30] take this token of appreciation!

data.name: Doduo_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Wild Pokemon aren't very smart. They'll lose you easily if you run through grass.

data.name: Doduo_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Maybe retreating isn't always the answer...

data.name: Hint_Father_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]That was strange, wasn't it?

data.name: Hint_Father_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]That Pokemon stuck in Exotic Wilds (later Deserted Fortress) didn't come with us when we used an escape orb.

data.name: Hint_Pet_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]That was strange, wasn't it?

data.name: Hint_Pet_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]That Pokemon stuck in Illusory Ridge (later Wayward Wetlands) didn't come with us when we used an escape orb.

data.name: Kidnap_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I'm hunting for treasure, but I keep getting lost... can you help me?

data.name: Kidnap_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]We Drifloon just blew into camp. Where we're going has plenty of rare items.[br]Will you join us, fellow traveler?

data.name: Kidnap_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]A free ride to treasure? Wow I could sure use a lift!

data.name: Kidnap_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]Is it just you? No one will miss you if you're gone? [br]Good.[br]Grab my strings, and we shall pass on to our final destination.

data.name: Monk_Line_001
data.value: Explorers on this island have many reasons for ascending this mountain range.[pause=0] What are yours?

data.name: Monk_Line_002
data.value: May you find what you seek here.

data.name: Monk_Line_Curiosity
data.value: But of course.[br]As the last unexplored region in the world,[pause=0] it is only natural for you to be drawn here.[br]Some may fear the unknown,[pause=0] but you are among those that are drawn to it.

data.name: Monk_Line_Fame
data.value: I see...[pause=0] so you have been lured by the rumors of the Guildmaster's promise.[br]That any team that reaches the top shall be named their successor.

data.name: Monk_Line_Fortune
data.value: The hidden treasures of the legendary exploration team![br]I too have heard the rumors of how they locked their fortunes deep within this island.

data.name: Monk_Line_Strength
data.value: Ah,[pause=0] our goals are one and the same.[br]Absent any desire for material gains,[pause=0] I am merely here to hone my body and mind.

data.name: Monk_Line_Unknown
data.value: Indecisive?[pause=0] Perhaps you will find a purpose nonetheless.[br]Experiencing the Mystery Dungeons can reveal things about yourself that you may not even know.

data.name: Monk_Option_Curiosity
data.value: Adventure

data.name: Monk_Option_Fame
data.value: Fame

data.name: Monk_Option_Fortune
data.value: Fortune

data.name: Monk_Option_Strength
data.value: Strength

data.name: Monk_Option_Unknown
data.value: Don't know...

data.name: Pachirisu_Done_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for helping us out![br]Have a reward!

data.name: Pachirisu_Help_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Doduo's stuck in Trickster Woods (later Deserted Fortress)![br]We had an escape orb but it became sticky![br]Please help!

data.name: Pachirisu_Help_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Doduo's stuck in Trickster Woods (later Deserted Fortress)![br]There were too many enemies, I had to Run Away![br]Please help!

data.name: Pachirisu_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Some moves like Tackle and Quick Attack can send you forward. You can use them to outpace your foes, and even cross short gaps!

data.name: Pachirisu_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]We should mix up our strategy and use our speed for offense too!

data.name: Rival_1_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I can't stand that zangoose! I can't let her get ahead of me!

data.name: Rival_2_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I can't stand that seviper! I can't let her get ahead of me!

data.name: Rival_Line_001
data.value: I musssst push forward.[pause=0] There is a rival I need to surpasssss...

data.name: Seer_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]We're team firecracker! We're performers!

data.name: Seer_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]We're team occult! Let me read your fortune.

data.name: Shroomish_Line_001
data.value: Come on,[pause=20] one more try![pause=0] We can do it with just the two of us!

data.name: Sightseer_Line_001
data.value: After the trailblazers set up camp in the ravine,[pause=0] the areas beyond were too hostile to camp in.[br]Even now, there's no clear path to the summit.

data.name: Sightseer_Quest_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I'm worried about meowth.[br]He was last seen getting carried off by a drifloon.[br]They were floating in the direction of Secret Garden (later Oblivion Valley).[br]Please rescue.

data.name: Sightseer_Quest_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Please rescue meowth at Secret Garden (later Oblivion Valley).

data.name: Sightseer_Quest_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]My intuition was correct. Thank you for rescuing meowth.

data.name: Solo_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I don't need teammates, I can get through myself!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_001
data.value: Confound it![pause=0] Where are those two slackers?[br]{0} and {1} were supposed to be here with the supplies a long time ago!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]I'll wait one more day.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]Deliver NPC had his package stolen in Faded Trail! Please help!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]Deliver NPC had his package stolen in Faded Trail! (You already have the quest)

data.name: Storehouse_Line_005
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for getting back the supplies! Have a reward!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_006
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for helping our delivery. Now we can go to canyon camp.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp]I'm on my routine route in forest camp!

data.name: Undergrowth_Intro_001
data.value: We're Team Undergrowth.[pause=0] Pleased to meet you.

data.name: Unlucky_Done_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for rescuing me, I should be more wary of strangers![br]Here, this is the free rare item they gave me but everytime I look at it I get bad vibes.[br]It's yours.

data.name: Unlucky_Done_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]I should be more wary of strangers![br]I'm taking the path to Ravine Camp myself now!
